00016 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00017  * File:    hcompi.h
00018  * Purpose: Internal library header file for compression information
00019  * Dependencies: should be included after hdf.h
00020  * Invokes:
00021  * Contents:
00022  * Structure definitions:
00023  * Constant definitions:
00024  *---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00025 
00026 /* avoid re-inclusion */
00027 #ifndef __HCOMPI_H
00028 #define __HCOMPI_H
00029 
00030 #include "hfile.h"
00031 
00032 /* Modeling information */
00033 
00034 /* structure for storing modeling information */
00035 /* only allow modeling and master compression routines access */
00036 
00037 #include "mstdio.h"     /* stdio modeling header */
00038 
00039 typedef struct comp_model_info_tag
00040   {
00041       comp_model_t model_type;  /* model this stream is using */
00042       union
00043         {                       /* union of all the different types of model information */
00044             comp_model_stdio_info_t stdio_info;     /* stdio model info */
00045         }
00046       model_info;
00047       funclist_t  model_funcs;  /* functions to perform modeling */
00048   }
00049 comp_model_info_t;
00050 
00051 /* Coding information */
00052 
00053 /* structure for storing modeling information */
00054 /* only allow encoding and master compression routines access */
00055 
00056 #include "cnone.h"  /* no encoding header */
00057 #include "crle.h"   /* run-length encoding header */
00058 #include "cnbit.h"  /* N-bit encoding header */
00059 #include "cskphuff.h"   /* Skipping huffman encoding header */
00060 #include "cdeflate.h"   /* gzip 'deflate' encoding header */
00061 #include "cszip.h"   /* szip encoding header */
00062 
00063 typedef struct comp_coder_info_tag
00064   {
00065       comp_coder_t coder_type;  /* coding scheme this stream is using */
00066       union
00067         {                       /* union of all the different types of coding information */
00068             comp_coder_none_info_t none_info;   /* "None" coding info */
00069             comp_coder_rle_info_t rle_info;     /* RLE coding info */
00070             comp_coder_nbit_info_t nbit_info;   /* N-bit coding info */
00071             comp_coder_skphuff_info_t skphuff_info;     /* Skipping huffman coding info */
00072             comp_coder_deflate_info_t deflate_info;   /* gzip 'deflate' coding info */
00073         comp_coder_szip_info_t szip_info;   /* szip coding info */
00074 
00075         }
00076       coder_info;
00077       funclist_t  coder_funcs;  /* functions to perform encoding */
00078   }
00079 comp_coder_info_t;
00080 
00081 /* structure for storing a state */
00082 typedef struct comp_stateinfo_tag
00083   {
00084       uint32      d_offset;     /* the offset of the state in the dataset */
00085       uint32      c_offset;     /* offset of the state in the compressed data */
00086       comp_model_info_t minfo;  /* modeling information */
00087       comp_coder_info_t cinfo;  /* coding information */
00088   }
00089 comp_stateinfo_t;
00090 
00091 /* structure for storing state caching information */
00092 typedef struct comp_state_cache_tag
00093   {
00094       intn        num_states;   /* the number of states cached */
00095       comp_stateinfo_t **comp_state;    /* pointer to an array of pointers to
00096                                            compression states */
00097   }
00098 comp_state_cache_t;
00099 
00100 /* compinfo_t -- compressed element information structure */
00101 typedef struct compinfo_tag
00102   {
00103       intn        attached;     /* number of access records attached
00104                                    to this information structure */
00105       int32       length;       /* the actual length of the data elt */
00106       uint16      comp_ref;     /* compressed info ref. number */
00107       int32       aid;          /* AID of the compressed info */
00108       comp_model_info_t minfo;  /* modeling information */
00109       comp_coder_info_t cinfo;  /* coding information */
00110       intn        caching;      /* whether caching is turned on */
00111       comp_state_cache_t sinfo; /* state information for caching */
00112   }
00113 compinfo_t;
00114 
00115 #endif /* __HCOMPI_H */
